thread.title: Fab hotel for London city break
thread.title_full: Fab hotel for London city break - Review of Premier Inn London Bank (Tower) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: C-Juno
title: Fab hotel for London city break
text: The hotel is in a great location for a city break. We had monument tube station a 2 min walk away and we could walk to and from lovely restaurants, shops and tourist sites within 15 mins. Great when traveling with children, and felt like a safe area. The breakfast was really good as hotel breakfasts go, all you could eat for 10.00 and the children ate for free. The family room was great with a double bed a single bed and 1 camp bed. Room was very clean. Would highly recommend this hotel and its amazing friendly helpful staff.
